title: Federer on His Exit and Holding Nadal’s Hand: ‘It’s Maybe a Secret Thank You’
description: In an interview, Roger Federer opens up about the emotions of his goodbye at the Laver Cup and about the future of men’s tennis. “Nobody needs to play like me, by the way,” he said.
dc:creator: Christopher Clarey
media:credit: James Hill for The New York Times
media:description: “I lost my job, but I’m very happy. I’m good. I’m really good,” said Roger Federer, who bid farewell to his competitive career at the Laver Cup in London last week.
